mapper.select: SELECT t.`id`, t.`clazz`, t.`request_uri` AS requestUri, t.`request_method` AS requestMethod, t.`request_params` AS requestParams, t.`operator`, t.`ip`, t.`ip_addr` AS ipAddr, t.`oper_time` AS operTime, t.`oper_desc` AS operDesc, t.`status`, t.`err_msg` AS errMsg FROM `tb_oper_log` t WHERE t.`is_deleted` = 0 AND t.`id` = #{id}
